column1: Dear @realDonaldTrump: The House went big and passed a $3.4 trillion Heroes Act. We also passed a $2.2 bill. Instead of playing golf again you can request the Senate to send you one of the bills. Then your name instead of Biden’s next year will be on the stimulus checks. https://t.co/8BH1ehTZoX
@MaxCadyLives @realDonaldTrump No
@mcphatboy @realDonaldTrump Asking hard questions is not being disrespectful. That’s the job of a reporter.
@mechanicman_com @realDonaldTrump Trump and his supporters lost 38 election lawsuits because there was no evidence to their claims of cheating.

@OverboostedOne @realDonaldTrump I am good at math. There were no improbabilities in battleground states. Polls showed Biden was favored to win many of the battleground states and he did but by lesser margins. Biden’s victory was well within the range of predicted outcomes.
